005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression.ResultType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDefinitionNodeItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItemFactory;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IDefinition;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModuleLoader;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.ConstraintComposingVisitor;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.ModuleLoader;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
023
024import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
025import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
026
027import java.util.Collection;
028import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
029import java.util.List;
030import java.util.Map;
031import java.util.function.Function;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033import java.util.stream.Stream;
034
035import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
036
037/**
038 * A module loading post processor that integrates applicable external
039 * constraints into a given module when loaded.
040 *
041 * @see ModuleLoader#ModuleLoader(List)
042 */
043public class ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor implements IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor {
044  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor.class);
045  @NonNull
046  private final List<IConstraintSet> registeredConstraintSets;
047
048  /**
049   * Create a new post processor.
050   *
051   * @param additionalConstraintSets
052   *          the external constraint sets to apply
053   */
054  public ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor(@NonNull Collection<IConstraintSet> additionalConstraintSets) {
055    this.registeredConstraintSets = ObjectUtils.notNull(additionalConstraintSets.stream()
056        .flatMap(set -> Stream.concat(
057            Stream.of(set),
058            set.getImportedConstraintSets().stream()))
059        .distinct()
060        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()));
061  }
062
063  /**
064   * Get the external constraint sets associated with this post processor.
065   *
066   * @return the list of constraint sets
067   */
068  protected List<IConstraintSet> getRegisteredConstraintSets() {
069    return registeredConstraintSets;
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public void processModule(IModule module) {
074    ConstraintComposingVisitor visitor = new ConstraintComposingVisitor();
075    IModuleNodeItem moduleItem = INodeItemFactory.instance().newModuleNodeItem(module);
076
077    StaticContext staticContext = StaticContext.builder()
078        .defaultModelNamespace(module.getXmlNamespace())
079        .build();
080    DynamicContext dynamicContext = new DynamicContext(staticContext);
081
082    for (IConstraintSet set : getRegisteredConstraintSets()) {
083      assert set != null;
084      applyConstraints(module, moduleItem, set, visitor, dynamicContext);
085    }
086  }
087
088  private static void applyConstraints(
089      @NonNull IModule module,
090      @NonNull IModuleNodeItem moduleItem,
091      @NonNull IConstraintSet set,
092      @NonNull ConstraintComposingVisitor visitor,
093      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
094    for (ITargetedConstraints targeted : set.getTargetedConstraintsForModule(module)) {
095      // apply targeted constraints
096      String targetExpression = targeted.getTargetExpression();
097      MetapathExpression metapath = MetapathExpression.compile(targetExpression, dynamicContext.getStaticContext());
098      ISequence<?> items = metapath.evaluateAs(moduleItem, ResultType.SEQUENCE, dynamicContext);
099      assert items != null;
100
101      // first build a map to ensure the constraint is only applied once to each
102      // underlying definition
103      Map<IDefinition, IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>> definitions = items.stream()
104          .filter(item -> filterNonDefinitionItem(item, metapath))
105          .map(item -> (IDefinitionNodeItem<?, ?>) item)
106          .collect(Collectors.toMap(IDefinitionNodeItem::getDefinition, Function.identity(), (v1, v2) -> v1,
107              LinkedHashMap::new));
108
109      // apply the constraints
110      definitions.values().forEach(item -> {
111        item.accept(visitor, targeted);
112      });
113    }
114  }
115
116  private static boolean filterNonDefinitionItem(IItem item, @NonNull MetapathExpression metapath) {
117    boolean retval = item instanceof IDefinitionNodeItem;
118    if (!retval) {
119      LOGGER.atError().log(
120          "Found non-definition item '{}' while applying external constraints using target expression '{}'.",
121          item.toString(),
122          metapath.getPath());
123    }
124    return retval;
125  }
126}
